Dataset guide Chapter 1 R Packages 1.1 Exploring data in packages: 1.2 List of packages with data

Dataset guide Joyce Robbins 2020-08-15 Chapter 1 R Packages 1.1 Exploring data in packages: Install datacat: remotes::install("jtr13/datacat") View information with: library(datacat) get_dataset_info("ggplot2") %>% View() 1.2 List of packages with data 1.2.1 alr4 Applied Linear Regression, 4th ed. Datasets to Accompany S. Weisberg, Applied Linear Regression, 4th edition (2014). Many data files in this package are included in the alr3 package as well, so only one of them should be used. library(datacat) get_dataset_info("alr4") %>% DT::datatable() 1.2.2 dslabs Data Science Labs Rafael A. Irizarry, Amy Gill Datasets and functions that can be used for data analysis practice, homework and projects in data science courses and workshops. 26 datasets are available for case studies in data visualization, statistical inference, modeling, linear regression, data wrangling and machine learning. get_dataset_info("dslabs") %>% DT::datatable() 1.2.3 MASS Modern Appplied Statistics with S Functions and datasets to support Venables and Ripley, Modern Applied Statistics with S (4th edition, 2002). get_dataset_info("MASS") %>% DT::datatable()
